keyProjects.description: It is an all stop solution for automatically maintaining, manupulating and sending images for all the platfroms used by fastretailing, including subsidiaries like uniqlo
rolesAndResponsibilities: Worked with multiple developers and decided on the stack and worked on the architecture
Co-ordinated with japanese teams responsible for other platform.
Conducted code review for peers and created test cases for automation testing
